data_reset.title: Manage Data
data_reset.message: Choose how you want to reset the application:

delete.title: Delete All Data
delete.description: Keeps your accounts but removes all transactions and settings. Account balances will be reset to 0.
delete.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to delete all data?

reset.title: Reset Everything
reset.description: Completely resets the application. All accounts, transactions, and settings will be deleted.
reset.confirm_title: Are you sure you want to reset everything?
